akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 98–181, title I [title IV, § 404(a)], Nov. 30, 1983, 97 Stat. 1208

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1709–1. Repealed. Pub. L. 98–181, title I [title IV, § 404(a)], Nov. 30, 1983, 97 Stat. 1208
Section, Pub. L. 90–301, § 3(a), May 7, 1968, 82 Stat. 113; Pub. L. 90–448, title III, § 315, Aug. 1, 1968, 82 Stat. 512; Pub. L. 91–78, § 3, Sept. 30, 1969, 83 Stat. 125; Pub. L. 98–109, § 2, Oct. 1, 1983, 97 Stat. 746, authorized the Secretary, until Dec. 1, 1983, to set the maximum interest rates for certain mortgage insurance programs, notwithstanding the authority of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish such rates, specified the criteria to be considered in establishing such rates, authorized the Secretary to provide that the interest rate applicable under section 1709(b) of this title be the negotiated interest rate specified in the commitment agreement, limited the amount of mortg
